Hey all! Done like told. Unrar the game, then copy over original Binaries folder this one, installed the new DirectX included with the game torrent but starting the XComGame.exe or the other exec file with the same name pops up in a splitsecond this message:

"Missing MSVCR100.dll, reinstalling the program could solve this problem."

Did anyone else get this message? I have done the Firewall blocking in Windows Firewall as well... I am not sure what the problem could be. I have refreshed my NVIDIA driver too. Any idea anyone? I would not mind buying it either if it is that good as it is said, but I am afraid I wouldn't get the original working either if this doesn't. I have Vista Ultimate 32, Geforce 9800GTX+, 3Ghz Intel, all recent games are running fine but this one.
Please help/suggest somethin if you could/would! :)

I'm having a really odd error. The game loads fine, no errors, but when i click new game, and get into the difficulty screen, Nothing works? I can click all the buttons, change difficulty, choose tutorial or ironman, but i cant start a game. it makes the noise as if i pressed the button but it does nothing. Every other part of it works though.

@LamehTheDark

This is easy to solve, just grab the dll here: http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?msvcr100

And the game will probably ask for MSVCP100 as well, which is in here:
http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?msvcp100

Just put both dlls in the "binaries/Win32" paste, together with the main .exe file (xcomgame.exe)
